alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:23PM CDT until July 14 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA...NORTHERN LEE AND SOUTHWESTERN PRENTISS COUNTIES... At 122 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blair, or near Baldwyn, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Baldwyn, Saltillo, Guntown, Mantachie, Blair, Pratts Friendship, Marietta, Chapelville, Eggville, Birmingham, Kirkville, Corrona, Graves, Frog Island, Unity, Indian Hills, Boggan Bend and Bethany. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
